commit_list.message:
[CameraRoll] Image orientation fix for #1845

Summary:
PR for #1845

Use ALAssetOrientationUp for image orientation.

Originally committed at https://github.com/facebook/react-native/commit/b34a85f4da87c62656ca9d29c5085a46e768d147
Closes https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/2214
Github Author: Adam Roth <adamjroth@gmail.com>
commit_list.repo_description: A framework for building native apps with React. http://facebook.github.io/react-native/

commit_list.message:
[Image] Improved loading of Assets Library and Photos Framework images.

Summary:
Update to https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/1969

--
Recent improvements allow RCTImageLoader to select a more appropriate sized image based on the layout dimensions. Sizes:

	- asset.thumbnail
	- asset.aspectRatioThumbnail
	- asset.defaultRepresentation.fullScreenImage
	- asset.defaultRepresentation.fullResolutionImage

Prior, only the fullResolutionImage was used. This was memory intensive and resulted in crashes when loading several large images at once. The updated implementation works well, but can be made more efficient:

Consider loading 10 8MP (3264x2448) images in 150x150 pixel containers. The target size (150x150) is larger than asset.thumbnail (approx 100x100), therefore the fullScreenImage representation is used instead (approx 1334x1000).

This commit will scale the asset to the minimum size required while taking into account original aspect ratio and device scale. Memory usage is considerably lower and many more images can be loaded in
sequence without having to worry
Closes https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/2008
Github Author: Adam Roth <adamjroth@gmail.com>
commit_list.repo_description: A framework for building native apps with React. http://facebook.github.io/react-native/
Impact++ is a collection of additions to ImpactJS with full featured physics, dynamic lighting, UI, abilities, and more.

A State Machine Implementation for SpriteKit in Swift

Arduino Ethernet boilerplate code

commit_list.repo_description: Clone of react native

commit_list.message:
[Image] Improved loading of Assets Library and Photos Framework images.

Summary:
Update to https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/1969

--
Recent improvements allow RCTImageLoader to select a more appropriate sized image based on the layout dimensions. Sizes:

	- asset.thumbnail
	- asset.aspectRatioThumbnail
	- asset.defaultRepresentation.fullScreenImage
	- asset.defaultRepresentation.fullResolutionImage

Prior, only the fullResolutionImage was used. This was memory intensive and resulted in crashes when loading several large images at once. The updated implementation works well, but can be made more efficient:

Consider loading 10 8MP (3264x2448) images in 150x150 pixel containers. The target size (150x150) is larger than asset.thumbnail (approx 100x100), therefore the fullScreenImage representation is used instead (approx 1334x1000).

This commit will scale the asset to the minimum size required while taking into account original aspect ratio and device scale. Memory usage is considerably lower and many more images can be loaded in
sequence without having to worry
Closes https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/2008
Github Author: Adam Roth <adamjroth@gmail.com>
commit_list.repo_description: Clone of react native

commit_list.message: made actions polymorphic, added expense models + logic, require money gem
commit_list.repo_description: social brewing

commit_list.message: fix login redirection; added recipes_controller + updated seed data (login as test1/password to see everything in action)
commit_list.repo_description: social brewing

commit_list.message: replace the concept of a 'brew_day' with a 'batch' that can span over multiple generic 'actions' (planning, brewing, kegging, etc...)
commit_list.repo_description: social brewing
social brewing

commit_list.message: added models: beer_style, beer_style_category, brewership, brewership_type, timeline, timeline_entry, updated seed data, updated brewery/show view
commit_list.repo_description: social brewing

commit_list.message: add reset stylesheets (fonts, resets), app.css, add brew_day and recipe models, update seed/test data
commit_list.repo_description: social brewing

commit_list.message: remove left over code from role_requirement, add :uniq key to membership relationships
commit_list.repo_description: social brewing

commit_list.message: remove vendored rails, rely on 2.3.5 gems. update readme. add instance methods to brewery.rb (role access)
commit_list.repo_description: social brewing

commit_list.message: add additional relationships/models (brewery_type, membership_type), update seed data
commit_list.repo_description: social brewing

commit_list.message: added migrations/logic for breweries/memberships. Updated a few views, started to user HAML (all other templates will be converted soon)

commit_list.repo_description: Cross-platform Braintree module for React Native

commit_list.message:
Add support for title, description and amount options.

Android:
https://developers.braintreepayments.com/guides/drop-in/android/v1

title => primaryDescription
description => secondaryDescription
amount => amount

iOS:
https://developers.braintreepayments.com/guides/drop-in/ios/v3

summaryTitle => title
summaryDescription => description
displayAmount => amount
commit_list.repo_description: Cross-platform Braintree module for React Native
A function to help script sequential events in ImpactJS.

commit_list.message: Added waitUntil mixin.  Unlike wait( n ).orUntil( … ), waitUntil will wait forever until the condition is satisfied. Useful for concepts like in-game dialog, ex: wait until the dialog display is no longer visible.
commit_list.repo_description: A function to help script sequential events in ImpactJS.

commit_list.message: added semicolons in tests to chase away lint
commit_list.repo_description: A function to help script sequential events in ImpactJS.

commit_list.message: Added thenUntil mixin, updated tests & documentation.
commit_list.repo_description: A function to help script sequential events in ImpactJS.

commit_list.message:
[CameraRoll] Image orientation fix for #1845

Summary:
PR for #1845

Use ALAssetOrientationUp for image orientation.

Originally committed at https://github.com/facebook/react-native/commit/b34a85f4da87c62656ca9d29c5085a46e768d147
Closes https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/2214
Github Author: Adam Roth <adamjroth@gmail.com>

[Image] Improved loading of Assets Library and Photos Framework images.

Summary:
Update to https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/1969

--
Recent improvements allow RCTImageLoader to select a more appropriate sized image based on the layout dimensions. Sizes:

	- asset.thumbnail
	- asset.aspectRatioThumbnail
	- asset.defaultRepresentation.fullScreenImage
	- asset.defaultRepresentation.fullResolutionImage

Prior, only the fullResolutionImage was used. This was memory intensive and resulted in crashes when loading several large images at once. The updated implementation works well, but can be made more efficient:

Consider loading 10 8MP (3264x2448) images in 150x150 pixel containers. The target size (150x150) is larger than asset.thumbnail (approx 100x100), therefore the fullScreenImage representation is used instead (approx 1334x1000).

This commit will scale the asset to the minimum size required while taking into account original aspect ratio and device scale. Memory usage is considerably lower and many more images can be loaded in
sequence without having to worry
Closes https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/2008
Github Author: Adam Roth <adamjroth@gmail.com>
